com.odesk.agora.mercury.publisher

Class TopicPublishersFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.odesk.agora.mercury.publisher.TopicPublishersFactory

  • public class TopicPublishersFactory
extends Object
    Created by Dmitry Solovyov on 12/08/2015.

    The factory for all topic publishers. Designed to be a singleton. Agora core instantiates it with Mercury Guice module and makes it injectable.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String TOPIC_NAME_DELIMITER

      Constructors

      TopicPublishersFactory(PublisherConfiguration publisherConfig, com.amazonaws.services.sns.AmazonSNSClient snsClient, String senderAppId)

      TopicPublishersFactory(PublisherConfiguration publisherConfig, com.amazonaws.services.sns.AmazonSNSClient snsClient, String senderAppId, Supplier<String> messageIdSupplier, Supplier<AgoraMDCData> agoraMDCDataGetter, PublisherMetricsHandler metricsHandler)

        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • TopicPublishersFactory

        public TopicPublishersFactory(PublisherConfiguration publisherConfig,
                              com.amazonaws.services.sns.AmazonSNSClient snsClient,
                              String senderAppId)
        The default messageIdSupplier would just generate a random UUID string. No metrics handler by default. Null agora MDC data supplied by default.
        See Also:
        the basic constructor

      • TopicPublishersFactory

        public TopicPublishersFactory(PublisherConfiguration publisherConfig,
                              com.amazonaws.services.sns.AmazonSNSClient snsClient,
                              String senderAppId,
                              Supplier<String> messageIdSupplier,
                              Supplier<AgoraMDCData> agoraMDCDataGetter,
                              PublisherMetricsHandler metricsHandler)
        Parameters:
        publisherConfig - - publisher configuration
        snsClient - - instance of AmazonSNSClient to be used for publishing
        senderAppId - - the ID of sending (publishing) application. Agora core sets it to the service name.
        messageIdSupplier - - the supplier for message IDs. TopicPublisher.MessageToPublish.publish() uses it to generate an ID before publication if it's not set explicitly.
        agoraMDCDataGetter - - should obtain agora MDC data from the publisher thread. TopicPublisher uses it to attach MDC data to every message created.
        metricsHandler - - publisher metrics handler

    • Method Detail

      • getPublisherForTopic

        public TopicPublisher getPublisherForTopic(String topicName)
        Obtain a TopicPublisher for Mercury topic given by topicName. The publishers are thread-safe, so this method always returns the same instance per topicName. Automatically creates SNS topic if it doesn't exist yet.
